card_name: The Circle Of Life Is A Spiral
rules_text:
Incarnate {4}{B}{G} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Destroy up to one target nonland permanent.
Deathtouch
Whenever this Revelation attacks, you may cast an unincarnated copy of it. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
